name: [GameJam]Only One, Steel Beam
description:
GMTK GameJame 2019, theme "Only One".
Failed Prototype. TOO many issue have burn most of the  time and in the end failed to implement most mechanic and add enough content for a least one level.
Description:
You  only have one Beam to destroy your enemy with your Beam-Luncher™. Thankfully it reusable.

Control:
Use WASD to move,
Mouse to look, 
Left-Click to Shoot
Right-Click to reload the Beam-Luncher™
